meanings.definition: A person who makes something appealing and accessible to a wide audience.
meanings.sent1: The popularizer of the new book made it easy for everyone to understand.
meanings.sent2: The popularizer of science made complex ideas simple for all to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The popularizer of jokes had the whole room laughing in no time.
meanings.sent4: She was a popularizer of fashion, turning ordinary styles into trends.
meanings.sent5: The popularizer of music brought joy to many with catchy tunes.

meanings.definition: To make something widely known or accepted by the general public.
meanings.sent1: He popularized the new dance move by teaching it to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The chef popularized the dish by sharing the recipe with his fans.
meanings.sent3: She popularized the idea of wearing socks with sandals, much to everyone's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The artist popularized abstract art by showcasing it in everyday places.
meanings.sent5: The singer popularized the song by performing it at every event.
